meanings.sent1: The ferry travels interisland to connect the two islands.
meanings.sent2: We took a boat ride interisland to reach the neighboring island.
meanings.sent3: The birds flew interisland to find a new nesting spot.
meanings.sent4: The bridge acted as an interisland link between the two islands.
meanings.sent5: The underwater tunnel was an amazing interisland connection.

meanings.definition: A journey or transportation between islands.
meanings.sent1: The interisland voyage was smooth and enjoyable.
meanings.sent2: She booked her interisland flight in advance.
meanings.sent3: The interisland cruise offered stunning views of the ocean.
meanings.sent4: The interisland ferry was the only mode of transport available.
meanings.sent5: The interisland trip was a memorable experience for the tourists.
